items.title: Maidens Hotel
items.p1: Air Conditioning and swimming pool with room service
items.p4: Maidens Hotel features 55 rooms and suites. Spacious rooms with high ceilings are unique when compared to the box-sized rooms of modern hotels. All rooms and suites are centrally air-conditioned, with amenities like mini bar and many more.

items.title: The Oberoi New Delhi
items.p1: Superior Room, Garden View with installed sanitizers
items.p4: Choose from 220 rooms and suites with spacious walk in closets, Italian marble bathrooms, teak floors and oak wood desks. Breathe easy with state of the art air purification systems that assure air quality on par with global best standards.

items.title: Holiday Inn Mayur Vihar
items.p1: Laundry and Doctor Service with ATM
items.p4: Offering its guests free parking, the hotel also has a gym and outdoor pool. Mayur Vihar Metro Station is less than 1640 feet away. Holiday Inn New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida is within a 20-minute drive from historical monuments of Delhi.

items.title: Pride Plaza Hotel Aerocity
items.address: Asset 5-A,Hospitality District,Aerocity,Indra Gandji International Airport,New Delhi
items.p1: Premier Room, Guest room, 1 King, Garden view and laundry service
items.p4: Located in close proximity to Delhi and Gurgaon, this 5-star hotel near Delhi Airport provides the finest accommodation and state-of-the-art amenities and serves as a delightful haven for business and leisure travellers.

items.title: The Lalit
items.address: Barakhamba Avenue Connaught Place, New Delhi
items.p4: The LaLiT Hotels in Delhi, one of the best luxury hotels in Delhi India, stands tall right in the middle of city’s premier business and commercial district – Connaught Place. Being the central luxury business
